about_the_game:
【overview】
"ENVY" is an additional character in the derivative fighting game "MGCM Combat Edition" where you can battle with attractive characters, magical girls, and demons from "New Generation Urban Pop Magical Girl RPG "I Am Magicami"".
She is a powerful demon who torments magical girls in the novel version of Magicami "Evil of Tailcoat".
In terms of performance during the game, she is skilled at taking damage while confusing the opponent with powerful projectiles and movement techniques.

content_descriptors.notes: This includes costume changes to thinner costumes, and certain techniques that suggest sexual acts. It also includes depictions of blood splatter during battles.

detailed_description:
***Precautions when purchasing***

This character can be unlocked by clearing Arcade Mode without purchasing DLC. Please purchase only if you are supporting the development or want to use the characters as soon as possible.
